member.name: T:RGN.Modules.Leaderboard.LeaderboardModule
member.summary: This module is responsible for player scores and ranks them according to their totals.

member.name: M:RGN.Modules.Leaderboard.LeaderboardModule.GetLeaderboard(System.String)
member.summary: Asynchronous method that retrieves leaderboard data. Resulting Data contains leaderboard description fields like id, name, type, etc.

member.name: M:RGN.Modules.Leaderboard.LeaderboardModule.GetLeaderboardIds
member.summary: Method to retrieve leaderboard ids defined for current project

member.name: F:RGN.Modules.Leaderboard.LeaderboardData.name
member.summary: Leaderboard name Is used also to store localization key for the name

member.name: F:RGN.Modules.Leaderboard.LeaderboardData.description
member.summary: Leaderboard description Is used also to store localization key for the description

member.name: F:RGN.Modules.Leaderboard.LeaderboardData.invertSortOrder
F:RGN.Modules.Leaderboard.LeaderboardData.decimalOffset
member.summary: The size of the decimal part e.g., with decimalOffset: 2, the number 1234 will be displayed as 12.34.

member.name: F:RGN.Modules.Leaderboard.LeaderboardData.resetEveryTimeAtCron
member.summary: Cron expression to specify reset period

member.name: F:RGN.Modules.Leaderboard.LeaderboardData.rewardsAtReset
member.summary: Rewards which will be earned at reset period

member.name: F:RGN.Modules.Leaderboard.LeaderboardData.createdAt
member.summary: Date and time when the leaderboard was created This field is automatically populated by the backend

member.name: F:RGN.Modules.Leaderboard.LeaderboardData.updatedAt
member.summary: Date and time when the leaderboard was last time updated This field is automatically populated by the backend

member.name: F:RGN.Modules.Leaderboard.LeaderboardData.createdBy
member.summary: User Id who created the leaderboard This field is automatically populated by the backend

member.name: F:RGN.Modules.Leaderboard.LeaderboardData.updatedBy
member.summary: User Id who last time updated the leaderboard This field is automatically populated by the backend

member.name: F:RGN.Modules.Leaderboard.LeaderboardReward.placeFrom
member.summary: The place from users will be earned

member.name: F:RGN.Modules.Leaderboard.LeaderboardReward.placeTo
member.summary: The place to users will be earned

member.name: F:RGN.Modules.Leaderboard.LeaderboardReward.achievementId
member.summary: Specifies reward, achievement contains virtual items reward, currency reward, etc
